Sign-In.disclaimer: To sign-in enter your phone number beginning with country code 228, then check for a message from Impact Stream (Sandbox) and enter your code in the pop-up.

Onboarding.heading: Complete Your Profile
Onboarding.disclaimer: Your information will not be shared with the public and will only be used for identification purposes and to contact you if necessary.

Proposals.heading: Proposed Grants
Proposals.nullMessage: There are currently no proposals or there is a problem with your connection.

Create Proposal.title: Title
Create Proposal.collaboratorsContext: If you are collaborating with other people on this application to make this proposal, search for them and add them here.
Create Proposal.grantInformationContext: Please give as much information as you have. Show that your project has been thoroughly thought through.
Create Proposal.communityProblemContext: Give a summary and include statistics if necessary to show that this problem is a detriment to the community
Create Proposal.proposedSolutionContext: Tell us what you plan to do about the problem and prove that your solution will work.
Create Proposal.sustainabilityContext: The best projects are ones that will be able to be perpetuated by Togolese people. We want to see projects that are built to last for generations.
Create Proposal.minimumBudgetContext: Amount in F.CFA (not USD or other), not exceeding 12,000,000 F.CFA.
Create Proposal.keyPlayersValidationMessage: Please provide people and venders involved.
Create Proposal.milestoneContext: Break your plan into steps. Show us what each step along the way will cost.
